property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Angel of Grace enters the battlefield, until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead. {4}{W}{W}, Exile Angel of Grace from your graveyard: Your life total becomes 10.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we cannot have peace, we will have justice." - Aurelia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Archway Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each Gate you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A ray of hope breaks through the shroud of rain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Law is the light of civilization.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In you go, big guy. Watch your head."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Civic Stalwart enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These are your streets. Defend them! This is your neighborhood. Honor it! This is your city. Save it!"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What makes a frog lizard any worse than a bird horse? Prejudice against the Simic, that's what. It's unfair!" - Thados Arquef, Guardian Project biomancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lies cannot long withstand the harsh light of day." - Lavinia

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Forbidding Spirit enters the battlefield, until your next turn, creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {2} for each of those creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Haazda Officer enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You two, cover the alley! You, with me! Eyes on windows, balconies, and rooftops. Who knows what a fish-octopus-crab can do!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the established order falters, what remains are ordinary people and their struggle to survive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times of unrest, the crowd is eager for the comfort of strong convictions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. It gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the new guildmaster's innovations, arresters can arrive on the scene moments before a crime is committed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Knight of Sorrows can block an additional creature each combat. Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The helmet reveals no eyes to witness your penance, no mouth to offer absolution.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Lumbering Battlement enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nontoken creatures you control until it leaves the battlefield. Lumbering Battlement gets +2/+2 for each card exiled with it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the price of your sins comes due, the Church of Deals is there to collect.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hunter in the city requires the utmost cunning to survive. It must pounce only if the kill is certain, and leave the remains where no one will see.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The guildmasters loom large in the political sphere, but in the end, the rulers of Ravnica are its people.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {1}, Sacrifice Resolute Watchdog: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A friend in good times, a guardian in bad times, and a savior when all else fails.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance. Addendum - When Sentinel's Mark enters the battlefield, if you cast it during your main phase, enchanted creature gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has defender and loses flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you can't control your mount, I will control it for you." - Mirela, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I await your donation." - Dasha, Orzhov priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other creatures you control with flying get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She breathes fair winds to tired griffins and lifts songbirds beyond the reach of stalking cats.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Summary Judgment deals 3 damage to target tapped creature. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, it deals 5 damage instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Any challenge to Azorius authority is met with swift and potent retribution.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many wings haunt the skies these days. Few of them bear good tidings." - Lavinia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Tenth District Veteran attacks, untap another target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I keep reminding myself we do this because others can't, because we love this city. If we don't save it, no one will."

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast and abilities your opponents activate cost {1} more to activate unless they're mana abilities. Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Twilight Panther gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pet that can hunt both flesh and spirit is precious in a place where smiling assassins keep company with ghostly shadows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Watchful Giant enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loitering is not only illegal but unwise, since those who stay too long in one place are apt to be stepped on.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Law is the voice of reason.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Benthic Biomancer, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Chillbringer enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you can see your breath, it's too late to run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best way to keep a secret is to forget it." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, tap that creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few Ravnicans are aware of the vast reefs in their world's hidden ocean. Far beneath the great sinkholes, where the light is blue and dim, merfolk tend the coral labyrinths that feed the benthic ecosystem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target creature spell. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not enough to defeat our foes. We must learn from them, too." - Vannifar

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. {5}{U}: Exchange control of Eyes Everywhere and target nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Faerie Duelist enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Faeries are easily offended and quick to exact a quirky revenge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, Gateway Sneak can't be blocked this turn. Whenever Gateway Sneak deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've been through every guildgate in this city, and no one sees me come or go."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Searching the city for Fblthp felt like sifting the rain for a single drop of blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of X target creatures and/or planeswalkers.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who cross the Dimir find enemies everywhere they turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mesmerizing Benthid enters the battlefield, create two 0/2 blue Illusion creature tokens with "Whenever this creature blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step." Mesmerizing Benthid has hexproof as long as you control an Illusion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Target player mills a card. (They put the top card of their library into their graveyard.) Tap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player mills twelve cards. A deck can have any number of cards named Persistent Petitioners.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead scry 3, then draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To control the present we must master the future."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Citizen! Your crime has been recorded. Cease movement and await arrest, or further penalties will be immediately imposed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When properly invoked, the plasma globule encloses the offensive spell with a satisfying slurp."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sage's Row Savant enters the battlefield, scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The streets of Ravnica are full of former guild members now using their institutional skills for personal gain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{W}: Senate Courier gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This Dovin Baan came from nowhere. Watch him. Read his letters. He is more than he appears." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's something peculiar about the rain today." - Janoc, Tin Street tinker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}{U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A better Ravnica begins with a better Simic." - Vannifar

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life has no mistakes, only experiments." - Yolov, Simic bioengineer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -4/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Relax. It's quite harmless. And it will dissolve completely in a month or two." - Navona, Simic field tester

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, scry 3 at the beginning of your first upkeep. Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not understand the future I see: the guilds subverted, the world at war, armies bent to a cruel conqueror's will."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Put target creature on top of its owner's library. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller mills three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can think of no greater punishment than answering your question in full." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card. {4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here, there is only truth." - Barvisa, Azorius emissary

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Wall of Lost Thoughts enters the battlefield, target player mills four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who intrude upon the Dimir seldom remember that they have done so.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drakes become especially voracious as they prepare for their autumn migration, hunting the city's thoroughfares from dawn to dusk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player discards all the cards in their hand, then creates that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In preparation for the conflict all foresaw, the Golgari called upon an army that had slept for millennia beneath the city.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice two creatures. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your spirits can rest in peace, for your debts are paid."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The pain of searing iron and razor edges pales beside the pleasure of performance." - Judith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Bloodmist Infiltrator attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, Bloodmist Infiltrator can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blood seeks blood, and nothing shall hold back its hunger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Carrion Imp enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No scrap of nutrition goes to waste in the undercity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am sewer-king!" said Rat. "I am quick and cunning and I know every tunnel." "No, I am king!" said Zombie. "I am cold and deadly and no rot can harm me." Then Croc came and ate them both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Make way! It's time for the final act!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Consign to the Pit deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First your whole life flashes before your eyes. Then you have considerable time to reflect on every regret as you plummet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Exile all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If your ears bleed, it's a party. If your eyes bleed, it's a Rakdos party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're only as dead as you feel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By design, the sarcophagus muffles the debtors' moans but does not silence them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you pay life, put that many blood counters on Font of Agonies. {1}{B}, Remove four blood counters from Font of Agonies: Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No worthwhile reward is easily gained." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature with power 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A debtor's soul has little value, except as a warning to others who might consider defaulting on their loans." - Ubea, Orzhov ministrant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gutterbones enters the battlefield tapped. {1}{B}: Return Gutterbones from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your turn and only if an opponent lost life this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Down here, things don't stay dead." - Lavinia

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, Ill-Gotten Inheritance deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life. {5}{B}, Sacrifice Ill-Gotten Inheritance: It deals 4 damage to target opponent and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The suffering of others is not my concern."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behold the groodion! Ichor-slurper, oozing fiend. Foulest wonder underground. Grandest vermin of them all!" - Zalin the Gutter Bard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'll pay what you owe, with your money or your life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace, deathtouch Instant and sorcery spells you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage they deal to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its stench corrodes steel. Its miasma sickens angels. Its finality ends hope.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Plague Wight becomes blocked, each creature blocking it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For some goods, the best couriers are the dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Any number of target players each lose 2 life and sacrifice a creature. You add {B}{B} and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov are not the only religious tradition on Ravnica, nor the oldest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) {3}{R}: Rakdos Trumpeter gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The louder their performance, the quieter we become in comparison. They are the perfect distractions, for only fools ignore the Rakdos." - Lazav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, Spawn of Mayhem deals 1 damage to each player. Then if you have 10 or less life, put a +1/+1 counter on Spawn of Mayhem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Spire Mangler enters the battlefield, target creature you control with flying gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its mandibles can leave a rider in the clouds astride a headless griffin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink {2}{B}: Thirsting Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your life is a blinding light, your breath a gale, your pulse a deafening drum. Be still. Be still." - Dahlya Trul, "Irbitov Lament"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Undercity Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Undercity Scavenger, then scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We grow strong by feasting on failure." - Izoni

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control dies, Vindictive Vampire deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In theory, the Guildpact keeps guild feuds from spiraling out of control. Personal feuds, however, are not covered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Until your next turn, Amplifire's base power becomes twice that card's power and its base toughness becomes twice that card's toughness. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From a great bonfire at the dawn of time, the first Gruul kindled their rage. The same flame burns in you." - Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Whenever Burning-Tree Vandal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ostentatious splendor of the Orzhov church was just asking to be smashed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control with power 1 or less attacks, Cavalcade of Calamity deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Let the Dimir worry about witnesses. For the Rakdos, screams count as applause.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Whenever Clamor Shaman attacks, target creature an opponent controls can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dagger Caster enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each opponent and 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keep coming. I have knives enough for everyone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target creature with defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrodominance deals X damage to any target. You may cast a spell with mana value X or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Basically, we turn a bunch of little lightnings into one big lightning."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lost are the lush meadows and verdant forests, where maaka prowled and lammasu soared. Lost are the wilds, where our hearts were free." - Daiva, Gruul storyteller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls. Then Flames of the Raze-Boar deals 2 damage to each other creature that player controls if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire will cure a multitude of ills."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gates Ablaze deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of Gates you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the Izzet's spirit of invention extends to the city's infrastructure, the results are sometimes explosive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Today the Rubblebelt is a bit larger. That's a good day's work."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to two plus the number of cards named Goblin Gathering in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Two's a party. Three's a felony.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Gravel-Hide Goblin gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No peace accord will save Ravnica. You don't build on rot. You burn it down and start again." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of an artifact, creature, or land that isn't a mana ability, Immolation Shaman deals 1 damage to that player. {3}{R}{R}: Immolation Shaman gets +3/+3 and gains menace until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, flip a coin until you lose a flip. For each flip you won, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {2}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) When Rix Maadi Reveler enters the battlefield, discard a card, then draw a card. If Rix Maadi Reveler's spectacle cost was paid, instead discard your hand, then draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul oracles see omens in all forms of destruction: the entrails of a maaka's prey, the flight of vultures over a battlefield, the scattering of toppled stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rubblebelt Recluse attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Joining a guild, even the Gruul, would mean giving up some of his independence. He'd rather smash what he wants to smash.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rumbling Ruin enters the battlefield, count the number of +1/+1 counters on creatures you control. Creatures your opponents control with power less than or equal to that number can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scorchmark deals 2 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you seen your face? Trust me, this will be an improvement."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Flying {3}{R}: Skarrgan Hellkite deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Activate only if Skarrgan Hellkite has a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Going to a Rakdos show is dangerous. Trying to leave early can be fatal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Smelt-Ward Ignus: Gain control of target creature with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Spear Spewer deals 1 damage to each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't waste time aiming, you lazy gob-slug! Fire!" - Krenko, mob boss

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every street's a stage, and every screaming bystander's an audience."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My shout is thunder and my fist is lightning!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {R}: Tin Street Dodger can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That giant didn't even see me, let alone catch me! And I was close enough to smell him! Of course, that's not saying much."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Imagine a gigantic pine cone that's extremely territorial and always in a foul mood." - Zhosmir, urban huntmaster

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Biogenic Ooze enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token. At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each Ooze you control. {1}{G}{G}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To survive exceptional times we must adapt by exceptional means." - Vannifar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, trample, haste When End-Raze Forerunners enters the battlefield, other creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Smash this city to pieces." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enraged Ceratok can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no time to calm it down! Run!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gatebreaker Ram gets +1/+1 for each Gate you control. As long as you control two or more Gates, Gatebreaker Ram has vigilance and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: So-called "battering rams" pale in comparison to the real thing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the sky screams, when the ground groans, the End-Raze will soon begin." - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.) Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Growth-Chamber Guardian, you may search your library for a card named Growth-Chamber Guardian, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Whenever Gruul Beastmaster attacks, another target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Gruul Beastmaster's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn't have the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic's strength comes from its diversity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce. If Incubation Druid has a +1/+1 counter on it, add three mana of that type instead. {3}{G}{G}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The good news is that the migrating drakes are no longer a problem." - Bell Migellic, Azorius hussar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card or Gate card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you don't have a destination in mind, the route is all that matters." - Tamina, district guide

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all artifacts and enchantments. For each permanent destroyed this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage! Rage until the whole world burns!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you get right down to it, the difference between death and life is just a membrane-enclosed environment maintained by a metabolic process." - Gulistan, Simic biomancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The roots run deep under stone and street, with strength that needs but a whisper to awaken.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with flying. Sagittars' Volley deals 1 damage to each creature with flying your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My bowstring hums in tune with the song of the Worldsoul." - Alcarus, Selesnya sagittar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hold the seed of our new beginning."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{G}{G}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within each of us, the potential for great power waits to be released." - Zija, Simic mutationist

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Silhana Wayfinder enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it on top of your library. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stay close! It's just a little farther."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}: Steeple Creeper gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the Fin Clade cannot produce a reliable venomous krasis, mobile in both air and water, then the Guardian Project will absorb its resources." - Vannifar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Untap that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you build, we will destroy . . . and bury you in the rubble!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sylvan Brushstrider enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mournful lowing of brushstriders warns of changing weather and ill winds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Boar gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The presence of the strong will make you stronger." - Yeva, Nature's Herald

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've been practicing for this all our lives. This is the final test!" - Korun Nar, Rubblebelt hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, untap all lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Walls crack. Buildings fall. Always the wilds return." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best construction makes the most satisfying destruction." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In your misguided attempt to subvert the law, you have eloquently explained why the law must exist."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The absence of binocular vision imposes certain challenges for a flying creature, which are overcome via echolocation." - Simic research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Azorius Knight-Arbiter can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thanks to the magic in his Writ of Passage, alms beasts lumbered aside, anarchs bowed their heads, and even Rakdos acrobats rolled their spikewheels out of his way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These new thopters are all well and good, but four eyes are better than none."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Basilica Bell-Haunt enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can hear their tolling only when your debt is due.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's easy to get taken in by the spectacle, to enjoy a bit of naughty amusement. But make no mistake: the Cult of Rakdos is a danger." - Tajic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana. {T}: The next time target creature adapts this turn, it adapts as though it had no +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Bolrac-Clan Crusher deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jaharg discovered that the shapes and symmetries so pleasing to the sculptor's eye also yielded a well-balanced bludgeon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Captive Audience enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen - • Your life total becomes 4. • Discard your hand. • Each opponent creates five 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, Cindervines deals 1 damage to that player. {1}, Sacrifice Cindervines: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Cindervines deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {2}{G}, {T}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, {T}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto another target creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery. {R}, {T}: Cult Guildmage deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Deputy of Detention enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls and all other nonland permanents that player controls with the same name as that permanent until Deputy of Detention leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Add {R} or {G}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains riot. (It enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) −3: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal up to two creature cards from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. −8: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of each end step, create a 4/4 red and green Beast creature token with trample."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Until end of turn, whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a loyalty counter on Dovin, Grand Arbiter. −1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. You gain 1 life. −7: Look at the top ten cards of your library. Put three of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dovin's Acuity enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw a card. Whenever you cast an instant spell during your main phase, you may return Dovin's Acuity to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dovin ticked the Planeswalkers off on his fingers: himself, Domri, Kaya, Ral, Vraska . . . and Bolas made an even six.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Emergency Powers. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may put a permanent card with mana value 7 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1. {2}{W}{B}: Exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it was a creature card, you create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Time to let the dead be dead." - Kaya, to Teysa

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 5 life or sacrifice a creature or enchantment. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's nothing quite like the feeling of paying off a large debt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, Fireblade Artist deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let's find out what kind of audience you are. Festive? Fearless?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Trample {4}{R}{G}: Frenzied Arynx gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Frilled Mystic enters the battlefield, you may counter target spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Galloping Lizrog enters the battlefield, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control. If you do, put twice that many +1/+1 counters on Galloping Lizrog.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I might have overfed him." - Gulistan, Simic biomancer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Vraska sees the grandeur in death but misses the hilarity." - Judith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Grasping Thrull enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Debt due! Debt due!" The thrull's screeching makes children flinch and debtors quail. "Debt due!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cyclical and spiral patterns are the specialty of the Gyre Clade, which seeks to revitalize the cycles of nature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) Trample As long as it's your turn, you and Gruul Spellbreaker have hexproof.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She displays her scars with pride.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As I contemplate what is, I dive ever deeper into the depths of possibility. Then I set an experiment in motion and watch the truth rise to the surface."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) {B}: Hackrobat gains deathtouch until end of turn. {R}: Hackrobat gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They all want to see me fall."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. Creatures you control can attack as though they didn't have defender. {2}{W}{U}: Untap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, you gain half X life and draw half X cards. Round down each time. Flying, trample Hydroid Krasis enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Havoc is a small price to pay for data.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rights of ghosts are strictly protected under Orzhov bylaws, and those who enforce them can count on the ghosts' assistance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other creatures you control get +1/+0. Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, Judith, the Scourge Diva deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the end of the show, she stands alone on a stage brilliant with blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. You gain 2 life if at least one creature card was exiled this way. −1: Exile target nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less. −5: Kaya, Orzhov Usurper deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards that player owns in exile and you gain that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. You gain life equal to the number of creatures you controlled that were destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Teysa convened the meeting of the Obzedat. Kaya ended it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, Sacrifice another nontoken creature: Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying. Afterlife 3 (When this creature dies, create three 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can't cast noncreature spells with mana value greater than the number of lands that player controls. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I told Jace that Ravnica would fall apart if he didn't take his responsibilities seriously. I didn't want to be right."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your debt is erased." - Hilgur, Orzhov euthanist

property.name: Rules
property.value: You can't cast noncreature spells. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hooves of the Raze-Boar will trample the weak - and their city - to dust!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Pitiless Pontiff gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pay in gold. Pay in blood. Pay with the servitude of your spirit kin. But pay you must."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spectacle {3}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) When Rafter Demon enters the battlefield, if its spectacle cost was paid, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rakdos Firewheeler enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target opponent and 2 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ever wonder why you never see an old Rakdos cultist?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Rakdos Roustabout becomes blocked, it deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That one has a bright future - perfect instincts for the rhythm of mayhem." - Judith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample When Rakdos, the Showstopper enters the battlefield, flip a coin for each creature that isn't a Demon, Devil, or Imp. Destroy each creature whose coin comes up tails.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.) When Ravager Wurm enters the battlefield, choose up to one - • Ravager Wurm fights target creature you don't control. • Destroy target land with an activated ability that isn't a mana ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature spells you control can't be countered. Nontoken creatures you control have riot. (They enter the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some view Domri's unlikely ascent as a sign of Ilharg the Raze-Boar's imminent return.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rubblebelt Runner can't be blocked by creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sly, stealthy warriors of the Slizt Clan survive by hiding in high ground and ambushing their enemies. Other Gruul call them skulkers and cowards, but only from a safe distance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A Gruul berserker is never unarmed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}, {T}: You gain 2 life. {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}: Seraph of the Scales gains vigilance until end of turn. {B}: Seraph of the Scales gains deathtouch until end of turn. Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Sharktocrab, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}{U}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on a creature you control, put that many growth counters on Simic Ascendancy. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Simic Ascendancy has twenty or more growth counters on it, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Spells your opponents cast that target Sphinx of New Prahv cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Azorius sphinxes are loyal to the precepts of the law, not to any particular guildmaster - even one of their own kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards. Addendum - If you cast this spell during your main phase, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not think me blind to your true mission . . . or your true master, Grand Arbiter."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sunder Shaman can't be blocked by more than one creature. Whenever Sunder Shaman deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You take our wilds, we take your city."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power 4 or greater. {4}{B}, {T}: Syndicate Guildmage deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a creature dying causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time. Creature tokens you control have vigilance and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While Kaya is guildmaster, Teysa waits patiently at the center of the Orzhov web of power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. During your turn, if an opponent lost life this turn, you may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with Theater of Horrors. {3}{R}: Theater of Horrors deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Zegana, Utopian Speaker enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card. {4}{G}{U}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Among the Zhur-Taa Clan, goblins are the first to enter battlefury. When the battle is over, the survivors are still frothing at the mouth, looking for someone to hit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Footlight Fiend dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This footlight's broken. Get me a stagehand!" - Judith

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tear down the city, lie by lie. Then throw it back at the liars, stone by stone." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {6}{GU}{GU}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.) As long as Scuttlegator has a +1/+1 counter on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Senate Griffin enters the battlefield, scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Senate griffins overhead used to make people think of order and safety. Not anymore." - Lavinia

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Orzhov vampires look for allies in unlikely places in case their new guildmaster turns on them. The fate of the Obzedat is proof of Kaya's power and her hatred of the living dead.

property.value: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card. // Target player sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to its power.

property.name: Color

property.value: Tap target creature. Draw a card. // Create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying, then you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {WU}{WU}{WU}{WU}, {T}, Sacrifice Azorius Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mandatory lockets enable the tracking of all Senate personnel for improved security and efficiency." - Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Gate you control. Gate Colossus can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, you may put Gate Colossus from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Counterbalanced forces sustain this city. No faction above others. A beautiful idea." - Emmara

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {RG}{RG}{RG}{RG}, {T}, Sacrifice Gruul Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In life, it was a cunning survivor, fearless and quick. May its power pass to you who as you wear its skull." - Gna, Gruul shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hey, wait! That's my boot!" - Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {WB}{WB}{WB}{WB}, {T}, Sacrifice Orzhov Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It looks expensive, doesn't it? You have no idea . . ." - Milana, Orzhov prelate

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {BR}{BR}{BR}{BR}, {T}, Sacrifice Rakdos Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This trinket will gain you admittance to some painfully exclusive gatherings." - Exava, blood witch

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard. {1}, Sacrifice Scrabbling Claws: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Feed it steel. Feed it gold. Feed it bone. In the belly of the furnace, the flames know no difference.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has "{2}, {T}: Target player mills three cards." Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {GU}{GU}{GU}{GU}, {T}, Sacrifice Simic Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like our guild itself, this locket can stand for many things. You must discern what it means for you." - Vannifar

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sphinx of the Guildpact is all colors. Flying Hexproof from monocolored (This creature can't be the target of monocolored spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, draw a card. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Reading it has given me a glimpse of what makes this deeply flawed city so very magnificent." - Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the populace fears our authority, then I'd say we have an appropriately sensible populace." - Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you want to know what's really going on in any building, you don't walk in the front door. You stake out the back." - Lavinia

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.) As Blood Crypt enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life is a show, and death its final performance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped. When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Chamber of the Guildpact has fallen silent, its bright promise broken.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {B}.) As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sin is debt, and absolution is paid in tithes of gold and blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beyond this gate there are no citizens, only predators and prey." - Domri Rade

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Old turf. Powerful turf. Much good blood spilled here." - Ruric Thar

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.) As Hallowed Fountain enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ever-watchful center of a growing web of eyes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie." - Kaya

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you think the cathedral is impressive, you should see what's down below." - Teysa

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Plaza of Harmony enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, you gain 3 life. {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any type that a Gate you control could produce.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My servants take pains for your pleasure, and take pleasure in your pain!" - Rakdos

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Slip in the back if you don't want to be recognized. Don't worry - we'll make sure you're never found!" - Judith

property.name: Rules
property.value: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation." - Vannifar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the Prime Speaker goes too far, I will be here in the safety of the deeps to correct her." - Zegana

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.) As Stomping Ground enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What we begin, the End-Raze will finish. Then we will dance in Ravnica's rubble." - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: You gain 2 life and draw a card. −1: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. −9: Tap all permanents target opponent controls. That player skips their next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold it! I need to see your papers."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put up to one target tapped creature on top of its owner's library. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Dovin, Architect of Law, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Dovin planeswalker, Dovin's Automaton gets +2/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was made for battle, but that doesn't mean it's unsophisticated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn. −3: Domri, City Smasher deals 3 damage to any target. −8: Put three +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Those creatures gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ragefire deals 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your precious laws can't save you now!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) As long as you control a Domri planeswalker, Charging War Boar gets +1/+1 and has trample. (It can deal excess damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Domri's Nodorog enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Domri, City Smasher, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, lifelink Whenever The Haunt of Hightower attacks, defending player discards a card. Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on The Haunt of Hightower.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It drains vitality from those it touches.
